data.name: RPG Maker MV - Medieval: Diseased Town
data.detailed_description:
What happened here? This is not the town and country I remember…

Fresh on the heels of the Plague Bringers comes an edited set of resources to really bring out the desolation, grime, and grunge of your blighted world. Inside are almost all of the Medieval: Town and Country and Medieval: Interiors tiles re-done in a grungy, broken-down, and diseased fashion.

Features:
  • 24 Re-worked tilesets from the Medieval: Town and Country and Medieval: Interiors packs.
  • 82 Pre-made buildings and castle pieces for a worn-down and gritty aesthetic.
  • This set greatly enhances the Medieval: Plague Bringer resources, as well as all other Medieval resources.
  • Read-Me and Instruction document.

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
